import React, {useState} from "react"; import {useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import {useNavigate} from "react-router"; import {addData} from "../redux/actions/action"; const Adduser = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", contact: "", address: "", age: "", number: "", birth_date: "", gender: "", language: [], }); const { name, email, contact, address, age, number, birth_date, gender } = user; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(addData(user)); navigate("/"); }; return(
handleSubmit()}>
); }; export default Adduser;
